meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unfamiliar.
meanings.sent1: The unfamiliarities of the new town made me feel lost.
meanings.sent2: She encountered many unfamiliarities when visiting a foreign country.
meanings.sent3: The unfamiliarities of using chopsticks for the first time led to a comical dinner.
meanings.sent4: Navigating through the maze of unfamiliarities was like exploring a mysterious forest.
meanings.sent5: The unfamiliarities of the dark cave filled her with a sense of adventure.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed various unfamiliarities from ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent2: Exploring the attic revealed a treasure trove of unfamiliarities.
meanings.sent3: The pile of unfamiliarities in the lost and found box puzzled everyone.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a jungle of colorful unfamiliarities waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The box of old photographs held a collection of intriguing unfamiliarities.
